text: {{Infobox settlement | official_name = Searchlight, Nevada | settlement_type = Unincorporated town and census-designated place | image_skyline = Searchlight NV view.jpg | image_caption = View of Searchlight, from the southwest | image_map = Clark County Nevada Incorporated Areas Searchlight highlighted.svg | mapsize = 250px | map_caption = Location of Searchlight in Clark County, Nevada | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = United States | subdivision_type1 = State | subdivision_name1 = Nevada | subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Clark | established_title = Founded | established_date = | named_for = Searchlight | government_type = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Imperial | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 10.03 | area_total_sq_mi = 3.87 | area_land_km2 = 10.03 | area_land_sq_mi = 3.87 | area_water_km2 = 0.00 | area_water_sq_mi = 0.00 | area_water_percent = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | elevation_ft = 3547 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 445 | population_as_of = 2020 | population_density_km2 = 44.35 |population_density_sq_mi = 114.87 | population_note = | timezone = PST | utc_offset = -8 | timezone_DST = PDT | utc_offset_DST = -7 | postal_code_type = ZIP codes | postal_code = 89039, 89046 | area_code = 702 and 725 | blank_name = FIPS code | blank_info = 32-65600 | blank1_name = GNIS feature ID | blank1_info = 0845654 | website = | footnotes = }} Searchlight is a census-designated place (CDP) and unincorporated town in Clark County, Nevada, United States, at the topographic saddle between two mountain ranges. As of the 2020 census it had a population of 445. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Nevada Category:Unincorporated communities in Nevada
